publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4172 Richard Lochhead: An Energy Institute for the Energy Capital—That the Parliament notes the announcement in the Budget of the creation of a new £1 billion energy and environment research institute; considers that Aberdeen, as Europe’s energy capital, would be the prime site for any such institute, and calls on the Scottish Executive to make the appropriate representations to the UK Government in order to push for this institute to be sited in Aberdeen. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Jim Mather*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Adam Ingram*
